title: Premios Tu Mundo
overview: The Premios Tu Mundo (Your World Awards) is an annual award presented by American television network Telemundo. The awards celebrates the achievements of Hispanics and Latinos in the media including TV shows, movies, music, fashion, and sports. The award show combines the power of television, web, mobile and social media platforms to give fans the final say in everything that moves and inspires them. The awards were established in 2012.
